mapper.insert: insert into BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGES (ID_BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGE, ID_BNF_CLASS, NM_BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGE, URL_BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGE) values (#{idBnfClassBnfImage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idBnfClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nmBnfClassBnfImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlBnfClassBnfImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID_BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGE, ID_BNF_CLASS, NM_BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGE, URL_BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGE from BNF_CLASS_BNF_IMAGES
